verses.text: And there \w happened|strong="H7122"\w* to be there a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*, a \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w*: and he \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* in \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, neither have we \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* in the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*: \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

So every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add and\add* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*: but the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w clave|strong="H1692"\w* unto their \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, from \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* even to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \add his\add* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, whom he had \w left|strong="H3240"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in \w ward|strong="H4931"\w*, and \w fed|strong="H3557"\w* them, but went not \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto them. So they were shut \w up|strong="H6887"\w* unto the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of their \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w living|strong="H2424"\w* in \w widowhood|strong="H0491"\w*.\f + \fr 20.3 \ft ward: Heb. an house of ward\f*\f + \fr 20.3 \ft shut…: Heb. bound\f*\f + \fr 20.3 \ft living…: Heb. in widowhood of life\f*

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*, \w Assemble|strong="H2199"\w* me the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* within \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and be thou here \w present|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 20.4 \ft Assemble: Heb. Call\f*

So \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w assemble|strong="H2199"\w* \add the men of\add* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: but he tarried \w longer|strong="H0309"\w* than the set \w time|strong="H4150"\w* which he had \w appointed|strong="H3259"\w* him.\f + \fr 20.5 \ft Assemble: Heb. Call\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w*, Now shall \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w* do us more \w harm|strong="H3415"\w* than \add did\add* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*: \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thou thy \w lord’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, lest he \w get|strong="H4672"\w* him \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w escape|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 20.6 \ft escape…: Heb. deliver himself from our eyes\f*

And there went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w*, and the \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*, and all the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*: and they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*.

When they \add were\add* at the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them. And \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* \w garment|strong="H4055"\w* that he had put \w on|strong="H3830"\w* was \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* unto him, and upon it a \w girdle|strong="H2289"\w* \add with\add* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w fastened|strong="H6775"\w* upon his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* in the \w sheath|strong="H8593"\w* thereof; and as he went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* it fell \w out|strong="H5307"\w*.

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*, \add Art\add* thou in \w health|strong="H7965"\w*, my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*? And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w took|strong="H0270"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* by the \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* with the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* him.

But \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* took no \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: so he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him therewith in the \w fifth|strong="H2570"\w* \add rib\add*, and shed \w out|strong="H8210"\w* his \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and struck him not \w again|strong="H8138"\w*; and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. So \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* and \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*.\f + \fr 20.10 \ft struck…: Heb. doubled not his stroke\f*

And \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w He|strong="H4310"\w* that \w favoureth|strong="H2654"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and he that \add is\add* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add let him go\add* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*.

And \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w wallowed|strong="H1556"\w* in \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w*. And when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w*, he \w removed|strong="H5437"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* out of the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* a \w cloth|strong="H0899"\w* upon him, when he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that every one that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* by him stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w*.

When he was \w removed|strong="H3014"\w* out of the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w*, all the \w people|strong="H0376"\w* went \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, to \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*.

¶ And he \w went|strong="H5674"\w* through all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto \w Abel|strong="H0059"\w*, and to \w Beth-maachah|strong="H1038"\w*, and all the \w Berites|strong="H1276"\w*: and they were gathered \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* also \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* him in \w Abel|strong="H0059"\w* of \w Beth-maachah|strong="H1038"\w*, and they cast \w up|strong="H8210"\w* a \w bank|strong="H5550"\w* against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and it \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w trench|strong="H2426"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w battered|strong="H7843"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, to throw it \w down|strong="H5307"\w*.\f + \fr 20.15 \ft in the trench: or, against the outmost wall\f*\f + \fr 20.15 \ft battered: Heb. marred to throw down\f*

¶ Then \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I pray you, unto \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, Come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* hither, that I may \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with thee.

And when he was come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto her, the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Art\add* thou \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am he\add*. Then she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I do \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

Then she \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, They were \w wont|strong="H1696"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in old \w time|strong="H7223"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, They shall \w surely|strong="H7592"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \add counsel\add* at \w Abel|strong="H0059"\w*: and so they \w ended|strong="H8552"\w* \add the matter\add*.\f + \fr 20.18 \ft They were…: or, They plainly spake in the beginning, saying, Surely they will ask of Abel, and so make an end\f*

I \add am one of them that are\add* \w peaceable|strong="H7999"\w* \add and\add* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou \w seekest|strong="H1245"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H4191"\w* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and a \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: why wilt thou swallow \w up|strong="H1104"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Far be \w it|strong="H2486"\w*, far be \w it|strong="H2486"\w* from me, that I should swallow \w up|strong="H1104"\w* or \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w*.

The \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* not so: but a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, hath lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \add even\add* against \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* him only, and I will \w depart|strong="H3212"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, Behold, his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* shall be \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* to thee \w over|strong="H1157"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.\f + \fr 20.21 \ft by name: Heb. by his name\f*

Then the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in her \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*. And they cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bichri|strong="H1075"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add it\add* out to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*. And he \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and they \w retired|strong="H6327"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*. And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 20.22 \ft retired: Heb. were scattered\f*

¶ Now \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \add was\add* over all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \add was\add* over the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w* and over the \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*:

And \w Adoram|strong="H0151"\w* \add was\add* over the \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*: and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahilud|strong="H0286"\w* \add was\add* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*:\f + \fr 20.24 \ft recorder: or, remembrancer\f*
And \w Sheva|strong="H7864"\w* \add was\add* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*: and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* and \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \add were\add* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*:
And \w Ira|strong="H5896"\w* also the \w Jairite|strong="H2972"\w* was a chief \w ruler|strong="H3548"\w* about \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 20.26 \ft a chief…: or, a prince\f*
